nodes.bodyText: I see the removeSample function reimplemented, what about the other service functions in here?  I'm assuming they're already done somewhere else?

So the answer to all your questions is that these functions had already been re-written for updates to other features (mostly the new cart).  The only functionality that was really still used was remove sample from cart I just refactored to use the new one.
So I'm assuming this is just changing to the cart functions in resources/js/apis/cart/cart.js?
Yes that is all that is happening here.
